title: is there a multiple $50 riot point card purchase discount?
body:
Hello Guys, I am an employee at an internet cafe locating at melbourne CBD.
Most of our customer/member play league a lot, but we had an issue with riot point purchase by credit/debit card, especially with visa card, the system blocks the purchase by showing

** "You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours"**

which is quite annoying, the another way is using paypal for them to purchase riot point, which will not block by system, but it makes no profit for us thus it is risking to do that since paypal is linking to our employee's credit card and there is no two step authorization for better protection.

So i was wondering is there a discount for us by purchase multiple(>20) $50 worth of riot point card(or code) ?

Thank you!

**Jas
Melbourne Sniper Internet Cafe**
